medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient's epigastric pain began four days ago. The pain is dull, intermittent, and worsens with oral intake. She experienced associated nausea and vomiting. The pain was present when she was seen in the ED two days ago but improved while in the ED.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension; previous abdominal plasty and breast reduction surgery.
